PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-06272014-05-29,  ,  ,  DESD,  LAB,  NRCAN,  AANDC,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Oil and Gas Occupational Safety and Health Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the OIL AND GAS OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to address issues raised by The Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations to correct (1) inconsistencies between French and English versions of the regulations; (2) unclear language to ensure that legal obligations are well understood; and (3) an erroneous reference to a section in the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0141 Publication Date: 2014-06-18
AttachmentsAttachment
